TopicTitle: KSP download from website not working?

Articles.Content: Hi, Trying to d/l 1.0.4 from the KSP website and it does not work? timeout response from the server?

HMMM,,, No answers here, no answers on the support link on the web site... not much support...

I begin to understand why some people are starting threads like: "What's With The Hate?"

sad.
Keep trying! Might just be traffic on the server?
Just tried it, seems to be working now. Are you still having issues getting it, REGZZZ?
I was able to downloaded it just now.. Thank you.
